header.title: Say Goodbye to Mosquitoes,
header.subtitle: The safe, effective, chemical-free solution to protect your children and loved ones from mosquitoes.

productCTA.title: Tired of giving up your nights for mosquitoes?
productCTA.content:
Imagine yourself sleeping soundly, with no buzzing, no itching, no stress.

Simply place our anti-mosquito lamp next to you, relax... and feel the tranquillity envelop you.

Thanks to its advanced LED technology, it attracts and eliminates mosquitoes without chemicals, odors or noise.
Protect the ones you love, and give yourself peace and security every night.

tryProduct.subtitle: 60-Day Trial
tryProduct.title: Discover MosqiBlock
tryProduct.content:
Protect your home from mosquitoes in just minutes and enjoy peaceful, bite-free nights like never before!

Try MosqiBlock for 60 days. If you’re not satisfied, you’ll get a 100% refund, no questions asked.

items.author: Sarah J.
items.title: Outstanding Product
items.content: No more mosquitoes! This tool really helped me out during my camping trip last summer. It killed all the bugs and I got to enjoy the outside without getting any bites.

items.author: Michael R.
items.title: Best Purchase
items.content: I was pleasantly surprised after using this mosquito lamp. I never expected it to be this effective and powerful. And the battery lasted for ages, so I could turn it on and simply forget all about this lamp and mosquitoes. I highly recommend this tool, it’s much better than other alternatives.

items.author: Joshua M.
items.title: Worth the money
items.content: Received this MosqiBlock tool super fast and it perfectly satisfied my needs and worked just as promised. I would recommend this lamp to everyone this summer, it’s very effective against mosquitoes.

productFeatures.title: Pure Peace of Mind
productFeatures.content: No harsh chemicals, just safe, natural protection for you and your loved ones.

productFeatures.title: Instant Protection
productFeatures.content: Advanced UV technology attracts and eliminates mosquitoes in seconds, for immediate relief.

productFeatures.title: Family Friendly
productFeatures.content: Safe for children and pets, no toxins, no heat, just peaceful, bite-free nights for the whole family.

productFeatures.title: Eco-Smart Design

rows.title: Technology
rows.mosqiblock: Advanced UV & trap system, no gimmicks

items.title: Does MosqiBlock really stop mosquito bites?
items.content: Yes, MosqiBlock uses specially calibrated UV light to attract and trap mosquitoes effectively without chemicals or odors. Most users notice a significant reduction in bites within the first nights, whether indoors or outdoors.

items.title: Is it safe for kids, pets, and houseplants?
items.content: Absolutely. MosqiBlock is chemical-free and non-toxic. The UV light is harmless to children, pets, and plants, making it ideal for family spaces and shared living areas.

items.title: How much space does one device cover?
items.content: One MosqiBlock covers approximately 20 to 30 square meters, suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, or patios. For larger areas, multiple devices can be used for optimal protection.

items.title: Can I use it both indoors and outdoors?
items.content: Yes, MosqiBlock is designed for both indoor and outdoor use, perfect for bedrooms, patios, camping, and more.

items.title: How long does the battery last?
items.content: The rechargeable USB battery lasts up to 10 to 12 hours, enough for a full night or outdoor evening. It recharges easily like a smartphone.

items.title: Is there any maintenance required?
items.content: Maintenance is simple: empty the collection tray every few days and clean the device with a brush if needed. No refills or consumables are required.

items.title: What’s included in the box?
items.content: The pack includes the MosqiBlock lamp, USB charging cable, and a quick start guide, all securely packaged for safe delivery.

items.title: What is your return policy?
items.content: We offer a 30 to 60-day satisfaction guarantee. If you’re not happy, contact our support for a full refund. The product must be returned in original condition and packaging.

items.title: How do I contact support if I have more questions?
items.content: Our friendly support team is available via email or contact form on our website to assist you with any questions or concerns.

footer.aboutText: We created MosqiBlock to offer families and outdoor enthusiasts a safe, powerful and easy way to enjoy life mosquito-free - no chemicals, no hassle, just results.

mode.utilisation: Everything you need for instant protection is included: MosqiBlock, a USB charging cable, and a quick start guide. The device uses advanced UV light to attract and trap mosquitoes quietly and safely—no chemicals, no odors. Just plug in, turn on, and enjoy peace of mind, day and night.

section1.subtitle: The Chilling Truth
section1.content: Every year, mosquitoes silently kill more people than any other animal on Earth. They are not just an annoyance—they are a deadly, global threat. While you read this, someone, somewhere, is being infected with a mosquito-borne disease that could change their life forever. This is not just a problem for tropical countries: the risk is everywhere. No one is truly safe.

cards.title: 1 Million Deaths Yearly
cards.content: Mosquitoes kill over a million people each year—more than any other animal. Deadly diseases spread fast.

cards.title: 600,000 Malaria Deaths
cards.content: Malaria took 600,000 lives last year, mostly children and pregnant women. Every minute, a child dies.

cards.title: Dengue Outbreak: 13M Cases
cards.content: Dengue is exploding worldwide, with 13 million cases in 2024. New regions face outbreaks every year.

cards.title: New Viruses, New Risks
cards.content: Mosquitoes adapt fast—climate change and travel bring new viruses and risks everywhere.

section2.subtitle: Don’t Wait for Tragedy to Strike.
section2.content: Mosquitoes are a daily, silent pandemic—one that doesn’t make headlines, but claims lives every single day. No home, no child, no family is immune. Protect your loved ones with MosqiBlock—your shield against the world’s deadliest animal. Because prevention is the only real cure.

reviews.name: Sarah J.
reviews.title: Outstanding Product
reviews.content: No more mosquitoes! This tool really helped me out during my camping trip last summer. It killed all the bugs and I got to enjoy the outside without getting any bites.

reviews.name: Michael R.
reviews.title: Best Purchase
reviews.content: I was pleasantly surprised after using this mosquito lamp. I never expected it to be this effective and powerful. And the battery lasted for ages, so I could turn it on and simply forget all about this lamp and mosquitoes. I highly recommend this tool, it’s much better than other alternatives.

reviews.name: Joshua M.
reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.content: Received this MosqiBlock tool super fast and it perfectly satisfied my needs and worked just as promised. I would recommend this lamp to everyone this summer, it’s very effective against mosquitoes.

reviews.name: Emily P.
reviews.title: 10/10 Protection
reviews.content: Before using this MosqiBlock lamp, I’ve tried many different mosquito repellents. From candles, to sprays, none was strong enough to combat the annoying bugs. However, this one, was a real shocker! It was super effective, had no unpleasant odors, and lasted for ages. And it’s so much more environmentally friendly – just recharge the battery and let it do its magic again.

reviews.name: Olivia J.
reviews.title: It’s Irreplaceable
reviews.content: No matter where I go, whether it’s a weekend camping trip or a night fishing by the lake, I always pack this mosquito lamp with me. It’s super tiny, fitting easily into my backpack, yet surprisingly powerful and reliable at getting rid of pests. I’ve noticed a huge difference in the number of bites I get, and it’s been a total relief not having to swat mosquitoes all the time. Plus, it’s so easy to use—just turn it on and it does its magic. Absolutely love it and wouldn’t head outdoors without it!

reviews.name: Ethan L.
reviews.title: Powerful bug control
reviews.content: Mosquitoes are a real problem here… I truly believe that they have mutated to be resilient to regular sprays or candles… Then I tried this lamp, and like magic the bugs were gone. I was mindblown… How quickly they all disappeared, and all I had to do was clean up their tiny bodies away and recharge the battery of this lamp to allow it to continue eradicating those bloodsuckers.

reviews.name: Ava M.
reviews.title: Super easy to use
reviews.content: I’ve been using this mosquito-killing lamp for a while now and loved it so much that I decided to get one for my parents. They were always complaining about mosquitoes constantly interrupting their sleep, especially during the humid summer nights. When I gave them this lamp, my dad was immediately impressed—he couldn’t believe how easy it was to set up and how silently it worked. It’s been such a relief for them both.

reviews.name: Sophia G.
reviews.title: Best Mosquito Controller
reviews.content: I love that this lamp doesn’t use any toxins or chemicals, making it a perfect choice for my family and me. It’s so much better for the environment, and I feel good knowing I’m not releasing harmful substances into the air we breathe. Plus, it’s reusable, not like those one-time candles.

reviews.name: Connie E.
reviews.title: Best zapper hands down
reviews.content: This zapper crushes the competition, no doubt about it. My family won’t live without it now.

familyBenefits.title: Enjoy Every Moment,
familyBenefits.description: Say goodbye to bites, buzzing, and restless nights. MosqiBlock lets you and your family enjoy summer evenings, peaceful sleep, and outdoor fun, without worrying about mosquitoes or harmful chemicals. Just turn it on and create a safe, comfortable space for everyone you love.

cards.title: Sleep Without Worries
cards.content: Give your children peaceful, uninterrupted nights—no itching, no tears, just sweet dreams for everyone.

cards.title: Safe for Kids & Pets
cards.content: No chemicals, no toxins, no risk. MosqiBlock keeps your loved ones safe, naturally, every single night.

cards.title: Silent Comfort
cards.content: No buzzing, no zapping—just calming silence for everyone at home, so you can truly relax together.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
content: All content on the site (texts, images, code, design) is the exclusive property of Hichem Ouahib.
Any reproduction, even partial, is prohibited without prior authorization.

sections.heading: Liability
content: The publisher cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from access to or use of the site, including inaccessibility, data loss, deterioration, destruction or viruses that may affect the user's computer equipment.
The user acknowledges using the site under their sole responsibility.

sections.heading: Modification of Legal Notice
content: The publisher reserves the right to modify these legal notices at any time. Users are invited to consult them regularly.

sections.heading: Right of Withdrawal
content: You have 60 days from receipt of your order to exercise your right of withdrawal without having to provide any reason.
To exercise this right, contact us at mosqiblock@contact.com with your order number.

sections.heading: Return Conditions
content: The product must be returned unused, in its original condition and packaging, and accompanied by proof of purchase.
Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer except in the case of a defective product.

sections.heading: Refund Procedure
content: After receipt and verification of the product, the refund will be made within 7 to 10 business days to the original payment method.
Customized or sale items are non-refundable.

sections.heading: Processing Times
content: Orders are processed within 24 to 48 business hours.

sections.heading: Shipping Areas and Times
content: Home delivery, pickup point, in France, Europe and internationally.
France/EU: 2 to 5 business days.
International: 5 to 10 business days.

sections.heading: Shipping Fees
content: Shipping is free for all orders.

sections.heading: Tracking and Incidents
content: A tracking number is sent by email upon shipment.
If you have any issues, contact us at mosqiblock@contact.com.

sections.heading: Data Collection
content: We only collect data necessary for processing your orders and improving your experience (name, address, email, etc.).

sections.heading: Use of Data
content: Your data is never sold. It is used for order management, customer service, and sending information about our products.

sections.heading: Cookies
content: The site uses cookies to improve navigation and measure audience. You can refuse them via your browser settings.

sections.heading: User Rights
content: You can request to view, modify, or delete your data at any time by contacting mosqiblock@contact.com.

sections.heading: Purpose
content: These terms govern the sale of products offered on the MosqiBlock store.

sections.heading: Prices
content: Prices are indicated in euros, all taxes included. The store reserves the right to change its prices at any time.

sections.heading: Payment
content: Payment is made online via the secure methods offered on the site.

sections.heading: Shipping
content: See the shipping policy above.

sections.heading: Right of Withdrawal
content: See the refund policy above.

sections.heading: Warranties
content: Our products benefit from the legal guarantee of conformity and the warranty against hidden defects.

sections.heading: Liability
content: The store cannot be held liable for indirect damages related to the use of its products.

sections.heading: Disputes
content: In the event of a dispute, an amicable solution will be sought. Failing that, the competent court will be that of the creator’s registered office.
